sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect, useMemo, useState } from 'react' import { BookOpen, Settings, Download, CheckCircle, Clock, AlertCircle, PlayCircle, Calendar, FileText, X } from 'lucide-react' import { useWeeks, useGeneration, useUsage, useDayFields } from '../hooks' import api from '../api/client' import type { Week } from '../types' interface DayField { key: string label: string sample: string } export default function SteelDashboard() { const [selectedWeek, setSelectedWeek] = useState(null) const [showGenerator, setShowGenerator] = useState(false) const [fromWeek, setFromWeek] = useState(1) const [toWeek, setToWeek] = useState(1) // API Hooks - now actually connected to backend const { weeks, loading: weeksLoading, error: weeksError, reload: reloadWeeks, exportWeek: exportWeekAPI } = useWeeks() const { generating, progress, generateWeek, resetGeneration } = useGeneration() const { usage } = useUsage(generating, 3000) const dayFields = useMemo(() => ([ { key: '01_class_name.txt', label: 'Class Name', sample: 'Latin A • Week 11 • Day 1' }, { key: '02_summary.md', label: 'Summary', sample: 'First-declension review with 30% spiral recall and 4 short translations.' }, { key: '03_grade_level.txt', label: 'Grade Level', sample: 'Grade 3–5' }, { key: '04_role_context.json', label: 'Role Context', sample: '{"sparky_role":"encouraging guide"}' }, { key: '05_guidelines_for_sparky.md', label: 'Guidelines for Sparky', sample: 'Keep tone warm, rhythmic; enforce recall ≥25%; one tutor voice; scaffold mistakes.' }, { key: '06_document_for_sparky.json', label: 'Document for Sparky', sample: '{"target":"Day1","vocab":["agricola","terra","aqua"]}' }, { key: '07_sparkys_greeting.txt', label: "Sparky's Greeting", sample: "Salvete, amici! Open your notebook—we'll warm up with our chant." } ]), []) const startGeneration = async () => { if (generating) return try { // Generate the selected week range for (let week = fromWeek; week <= toWeek; week++) { await generateWeek(week) } // Reload weeks after generation completes await reloadWeeks() } catch (error) { console.error('Generation failed:', error) } } const handleExportWeek = async (week: Week) => { try { await exportWeekAPI(week.number) api.downloadWeek(week.number) } catch (error) { console.error('Export failed:', error) alert(`Export failed: ${error instanceof Error ? error.message : 'Unknown error'}`) } } const handleCloseGenerator = () => { setShowGenerator(false) resetGeneration() } // Calculate real stats from backend data const stats = useMemo(() => { const completedWeeks = weeks.filter(w => w.status === 'completed').length const totalFields = 35 * 4 * 7 const completedFields = completedWeeks * 4 * 7 const validatedWeeks = weeks.filter(w => w.validated).length const validationRate = completedWeeks > 0 ? Math.round((validatedWeeks / completedWeeks) * 100) : 0 return { weeksCompleted: completedWeeks, fieldsCompleted: completedFields, totalFields, validationRate, readyToExport: validatedWeeks, } }, [weeks]) useEffect(() => { return () => { resetGeneration() } }, [resetGeneration]) useEffect(() => { if (!showGenerator) { resetGeneration() } }, [showGenerator, resetGeneration]) return (

STEEL

Latin A Curriculum Generator

{showGenerator && (

Generate Latin A Curriculum

{!generating ? ( <>
setFromWeek(parseInt(e.target.value))} min={1} max={35} className="w-24 px-3 py-2 border border-gray-300 rounded-lg focus:ring-2 focus:ring-amber-500 focus:border-amber-500" aria-label="Start week" /> to setToWeek(parseInt(e.target.value))} min={1} max={35} className="w-24 px-3 py-2 border border-gray-300 rounded-lg focus:ring-2 focus:ring-amber-500 focus:border-amber-500" aria-label="End week" />

35 weeks × 4 days × 7 fields = 980 total fields

Estimated time: {(toWeek - fromWeek + 1) * 45}–{(toWeek - fromWeek + 1) * 60} minutes

Estimated cost: ~${(toWeek - fromWeek + 1) * 12}–${(toWeek - fromWeek + 1) * 15} in API usage

) : (
{progress?.message || 'Generating...'} {progress ? Math.round((progress.field / progress.totalFields) * 100) : 0}%
    {progress?.status === 'completed' && (
  • Week {progress.week} generated successfully!
    • )} {progress?.status === 'generating' && (
  • {progress.message}
    • )} {progress?.status === 'error' && (
  • {progress.message}
    • )}
{usage && (

Live Stats

Tokens: {usage.total_tokens?.toLocaleString() || 0} | Cost: ${usage.total_cost?.toFixed(2) || '0.00'}

)}
)}
)}
} label="Weeks Generated" value={`${stats.weeksCompleted}/35`} /> } label="Fields Complete" value={<>{stats.fieldsCompleted}of {stats.totalFields} total} /> } label="Validation Rate" value={`${stats.validationRate}%`} /> } label="Ready to Export" value={stats.readyToExport.toString()} />
{weeksError && (

Backend Connection Error

{weeksError}

)}

Curriculum Overview

{weeksLoading ? (

Loading curriculum data...

) : (
{weeks.map(week => (
)}
))}
)} {selectedWeek && setSelectedWeek(null)} dayFields={dayFields} />} ) } interface WeekDetailsModalProps { weekNumber: number onClose: () => void dayFields: DayField[] } function WeekDetailsModal({ weekNumber, onClose, dayFields }: WeekDetailsModalProps) { const [activeDay, setActiveDay] = useState(1) const { day, loading } = useDayFields(weekNumber, activeDay) return (

Week {weekNumber}

4 lessons • 28 fields total

{[1, 2, 3, 4].map(dayNum => ( ))}

Day {activeDay} • All 7 Fields

{loading ? (

Loading day fields...

) : (
{dayFields.map((field, idx) => { const fieldValue = day?.fields[field.key] || field.sample const isJson = field.key.endsWith('.json') const displayValue = isJson && typeof fieldValue === 'object' ? JSON.stringify(fieldValue, null, 2) : fieldValue return (
{idx + 1}

{field.label}

{field.key}

{displayValue}

) })}
)}
) } function Stat({ icon, label, value }) { return (

{label}

{value}
{icon}
) } function Row({ k, v }) { return (
{k}{v}
) }
